extendedInfo.description: v6.2: Bug fixv6.1: Editable cardsSight Words â Help prepare your child for kindergarten. Designed for children who are ready to learn to read and review sight words, this shows each word on a separate card in large font.  * Use Edit Mode to change the words. Make it your own deck by adding your voice or your childâs! Add or change words as you need to.  * Star the cards that you would like to review with your child and use the Favorites Mode to create your custom deck. * Change the settings to display lower case letters or UPPER CASE letters using the Toggle Case settings option. * Randomly show a letter using the Random Button. * Swipe through the cards, or use the large buttons to move from word to word.  * Turn off the audio using the Quiz ModeAt Five Pumpkins, we strive to make high quality apps and distribute them for free on Android. We want to help as many children as possible learn their alphabets and gain a solid grounding in pre-reading and pre-math skills. We really hope these are as much for your toddlers and preschoolers to use as they were for us to build. If you would like to donate and support our development efforts, please contact us at info@fivepumpkins.com. If you have ideas for other toddler applications or kids games, feel free to let us know. We love to hear from our users. You can see our other educational apps and games by searching for "Five Pumpkins" in the Android Store or checking out m.fivepumpkins.com. Follow us at twitter.com/fivepumpkins or become a fan of our Facebook page (http://www.facebook.com/pages/Five-Pumpkins/241886129858)!

reviews.title: Another simple and excellent learning game!
reviews.comment: Thank you - the only challenge we had was our kids figured out how to edit the word and we had words like \"fkfsjhd fsdfskd saj\" showing up from time to time :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good app for 6 and 4 yr old. Quiz mode should be defalt. Arrow buttons should be larger. Would be better if levels = #of words.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: 19 month old loves it.. able to record the words in our voice....wish the cards would allow space for 6+ characters...could not create a mommy card
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: speech
reviews.comment: some of the words when spoken by app don\'t come out clear so when my son repeats it he\'s not repeating the correct word or sound..please fix
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love that u can edit the word and put in new words for them to learn... Plus u can record your own voice
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great & kids love
reviews.comment: Great app! Easy for my kids & they like reviewing on their own now too!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great concept
reviews.comment: This app ia a great concept.  I love the fact that you can edit the cards.  One problem...  when I tried to record myself saying the word, it didn\'t work.  Has anyone had the same problem?  Anyone have suggestions for a solution?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It could be better. Needs a visual aid for kids just learning. Then have the words alone. My daughter doesn\'t want to play. Sry UI.....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great tool for my pre-k son!
reviews.comment: I can star his sight words as favorites and focus only on those. Wonderful app!! SG2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love, but wish there were lists of decks and more advanced words. My 4 year old son read almost all the words on the first try in quiz mode!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Editing cards
reviews.comment: Love that I can edit the cards to make the list match with our curriculum. And favorites let\'s them practice only the words needed @ the moment.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app. My kids play it while we are shopping and have improved their reading skills while having fun :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: This will be great to help my kindergartener!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: We love how we can personalize my 4 year holds voice for each card, makes it fun. Great idea.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ladychardy
reviews.comment: I love customizing the words with my voice for my daughter.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thank you so much for this app!!
reviews.comment: I was thankful that I found, its very good app and my two year old start reading where ever we go if I want to teach him to read I can do it with book with me. Just one thing is that I want to download the other app but it won\'t allow me because it wasn\'t design for sd card. But this app is amazing.. thank you. God bless your work.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great but would love to be able to add words
reviews.comment: This app is clean and easy to use. Absolutely fantastic compared to other apps. It would be nice to be able to add new words without removing existing words. The existing selection is pretty meager.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FANTASTIC Saves to sd
reviews.comment: I love it great app for the kids! Actual learning apps not junk and it saves to my sd!! Thank you five pumpkins not only r the kids happy but so am I
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: Helps my son learn his spelling words for the week so much easier.
